text: Bipin Joshi is a student from Nepal who was taken hostage by the group Hamas during the October 2023 attack on Israel. He was staying at Kibbutz Alumim in Israel, where he was learning farming. In 2025, he is still held in the Gaza Strip. == Early life and education == Bipin Joshi was born in Kailali District, Nepal. In 2023, he went to Israel for an agriculture training program at Kibbutz Alumim. == Kidnapping == On 7 October 2023, Hamas attacked Kibbutz Alumim. Bipin Joshi and other Nepali students were there. Some Nepali students were killed. Joshi was taken hostage and brought to Gaza. == Response and efforts == Nepal's government asked help from Israel, Qatar, and others to free him. His family also asked the world for support. His name was not on the early list of hostages to be freed in the 2025 Gaza ceasefire deal. == Related pages == * Gaza war == References == Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Nepalese people
title: Abduction of Nepali student Bipin Joshi by Hamas in 2023
